mapper.sql: order_id, product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, order_no, total_amount, quantity, receiver_name, `address`, phone_number, buyer_remark, `status`, pay_type, create_time, pay_time, ship_time, receive_time, cancel_time, pay_expire_time
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET pay_time = #{payTime}, pay_type = #{payType}, `status` = 'PENDING_SHIPMENT' -- 支付后自动更新为待发货状态 WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND `status` = 'PENDING_PAYMENT' -- 仅允许未支付订单更新支付信息
UPDATE `order` SET ship_time = #{shipTime}, `status` = 'PENDING_RECEIVE' -- 发货后自动更新为待收货状态 WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND `status` = 'PENDING_SHIPMENT' -- 仅允许待发货订单更新发货时间
UPDATE `order` SET receive_time = #{receiveTime}, `status` = 'COMPLETED' -- 收货后自动更新为已完成状态 WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND `status` = 'PENDING_RECEIVE' -- 仅允许待收货订单更新收货时间
